articles.title: Hawaii records 4 new coronavirus-related deaths, 916 additional infections - Honolulu Star-Advertiser
articles.description: Hawaii Department of Health officials today reported four new coronavirus-related deaths and 916 new confirmed and probable infections statewide, bringing the state’s totals since the start of the pandemic to 1,226 fatalities and 226,451 cases.
